Trade/Device Name(s): VITROS Chemistry Products DAT Performance Verifiers I
VITROS Chemistry Products DAT Performance Verifiers II
VITROS Chemistry Products DAT Performance Verifiers III
VITROS Chemistry Products DAT Performance Verifiers IV
VITROS Chemistry Products DAT Performance Verifiers V
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VITROS BARB Reagent, Calibrator Kits, and Performance Verifiers for detection and control of barbiturates in urine using immunoassay on the VITROS 5,1 FS Chemistry System
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro diagnostic use; semi-quantitative or qualitative determination of barbiturates in human urine to aid in diagnosis and treatment of barbiturate use or overdose, with calibrators and controls for calibration and monitoring performance of drugs of abuse assays
